data.annotationProperty: MindRaider is an easy-to-use system for organizing of your resources - local files, analytical documents, images, thoughts, friends, tasks, web links, etc. MindRaider enables you to annotate these resources with metadata describing how they are related. Also it provides a visualization of metadata and data. Data and metadata are created in open and standard formats like XML and RDF. It is intended to provide OPML export/import in order to enable further processing. Therefore there is no "vendor-lock". You can quit using MindRaider at anytime (if not satisfied ;-) and keep your data.
